bio.p: Michelle Chen is a fourth-year student at Johns Hopkins University pursuing her bachelor of science in chemical and biomolecular engineering with a minor in applied math and statistics. She was an Oak Ridge Institute of Science and Engineering Fellow within the FDA, researched giant unilamellar vesicles in inertial microfluidics at school, and has completed internships in the biopharma sector utilizing statistics. She hopes to pursue a career in manufacturing within FDA-regulated businesses upon graduation.
